Dear Nursery_E Admissions Team,

Our details:
- Earliest start date: immediately

- Attendance pattern: full-time, Monday–Friday
- Hours: standard full-day coverage (we can align to your core hours; no special schedule constraints)
- Commitment: if offered the place, we can confirm the same day and complete enrollment paperwork right away.

If there is any additional information you need (references, child profile, fees deposit timing), please let me know and I will provide it promptly.

Sincerely,
Parent_E

Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for your continued interest.

At the moment, our remaining place is still unfilled. We expect to make a final decision very soon—within the next 1–2 rounds of conversations (i.e., by the end of this week at the latest), depending on whether any other pending discussions convert into formal applications.

Regarding what would strengthen your candidacy: at this stage the decision is primarily driven by our priority order rather than additional materials. That said, if you would like us to keep you as an active backup in the event the place is not taken by a higher-priority applicant, the most helpful items are:
- confirmation that you can accept immediately if offered, and
- any non-negotiable constraints we should be aware of (medical/allergy needs, specific hours that must be covered, start-date hard deadline).

If nothing has changed since your last message (immediate start, full-time Mon–Fri, standard hours, able to confirm same day), you don’t need to resend documents right now—we have that on file.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions
